code: import React from"react";import countdown from"countdown";export function useCountdown(date,max){var result=" ";if(new Date(date)<new Date()){result="".concat(countdown(new Date(date),new Date(),"X",max).toString()," ago");}else{result="In ".concat(countdown(new Date(date),new Date(),"X",max).toString());}return{counteddownDate:result};}
